description: Grimsby boost their top-seven aspirations by coming from behind to beat faltering League Two leaders Walsall.
title: Walsall 1-3 Grimsby Town
maintext:
Walsall have won each of their last two league games against Grimsby Town, last winning more in succession against the Mariners between 1975 and 1977 (four wins).
Grimsby Town have won just three of their 34 away Football League games against Walsall since their first meeting in 1892 (D6 L25), though two of those wins have come across their last four visits to the Bescot Stadium.
After losing their last home league game against Swindon Town 1-0, Walsall will be looking to avoid losing successive matches at the Bescot Stadium since a run of three in February 2022.
